season_info.notes: Season 27 Amped introduces major reworks for Valkyrie, Rampart, Horizon, global Mantle Boost, Trident 2.0, Ranked KP tweaks, and Olympus Rising map overhaul.

legends.name: Valkyrie

tactical.name: Missile Swarm
tactical.description: Fire a cluster of mini‑rockets that damage and disorient enemies; on hit they now briefly reveal enemies and suppress movement passives.
tactical.mechanics: Fires a grid of rockets at a targeted area. No self‑damage or self‑stun. On hit applies ~1.5 s full‑body scan and temporarily disables movement passives like Mantle Boost. Vertical clearance restriction removed; max range increased to ~125 m.
tech: Can be fired while skydiving (except from dropship).
Applies EMP‑style movement‑passive cooldown on hit.
Combines with Skyward Dive for immediate post‑launch scans.

passive.name: VTOL Jets
passive.description: Jetpack with directional control and fuel management. In S27 it refuels much faster, flies faster, but has reduced total fuel (6 s) and no mid‑air refuel until landing.

ultimate.name: Skyward Dive
ultimate.description: Prepare for launch, then boost Valkyrie and nearby teammates into a redeploy skydive.

unique_movement_passives: VTOL Jets for sustained aerial movement
Global Mantle Boost for momentum bursts after mantling
Improved airborne control during Skyward Dive
movement_profile.notes: Jets now emphasize longer burns for travel speed; horizontal and vertical speeds significantly increased.

interactions: Missile Swarm scan applies movement‑passive cooldowns
Skyward Dive can fire tactical while skydiving (except from dropship)
known_tech: Skyward Dive tap‑cancel for quick reposition
Mantle Boost into jetpack for extra burst

patch_history.summary: Major jetpack and tactical rework, buffs to ultimate and skydive usability.

weapons: Bocek Compound Bow or G7 Scout
recommended_loadouts.notes: Leverage Alternator’s S27 buff and Double Tap for close/mid fights; pair with a marksman/bow to punish from Valkyrie jet angles.

legends.name: Rampart

tactical.name: Amped Cover
tactical.description: Deploy a crouch‑height wall that becomes a shielded cover with a roof. Damage dealt through the shield or wall stores charge that can be consumed for a sprint speed boost.
tactical.mechanics: Wall gains a roof and can store up to 300 damage. When fully charged, crossing the wall grants a sprint‑only speed boost up to 15 s. Damage to wall counts as 0.25 x, damage through shield counts as 1.0 x. Walls scale health with Rampart’s Evo level.
tech: Place walls early to block damage and bank speed boost
Destroyed walls auto‑grant boost to nearby teammates
Use walls to counter‑peek sniper angles

passive.name: Battle Modder
passive.description: Upgraded Modded Loader. LMG/minigun mag and reload bonuses remain, and Amped Cover walls gain permanent health per Evo level.

ultimate.name: Mobile Minigun ‘Sheila’
ultimate.description: Deploy or carry a powerful minigun for lane control and burst suppression.

unique_movement_passives: Ring Consoles reveal next ring location
Mantle Boost off own walls for micro‑movement
movement_profile.notes: Movement remains standard; survivability driven by wall health scaling and speed‑boost mechanic.

interactions: Frag grenade damage multiplier increased to 2.0, Arc Star normalized to 1.0
Walls scale with Evo level (up to ~800 HP wall, 225 shield HP)
Locked and Loaded upgrade grants infinite ammo and faster reloads while behind intact Amped Cover
known_tech: Wall charge + speed boost for team‑wide re‑peeks
Mantle Boost combo with walls for hard‑to‑track strafes

patch_history.summary: Full kit refresh focusing on wall durability, offensive tempo, and speed‑boost utility.

level_2: Combat Reserve (new) – larger ammo stacks, extra grenade slots, red Weapon Supply Bins
Locked and Loaded (new) – infinite ammo & faster reload behind intact Amped Cover
level_3: Rebuild Module (new) – Amped Cover slowly regenerates health/shield when undamaged

recommended_loadouts.context: Ranked Olympus choke control / late‑ring holds
recommended_loadouts.notes: Lean into LMG synergies from Battle Modder. Use walls to anchor space around Olympus POIs while shotguns/SMGs clean up pushes.

legends.name: Horizon

tactical.name: Gravity Lift
tactical.description: Create a vertical lift that boosts players upward and allows aerial repositioning, now with faster lift speed, longer hover time, and much shorter effective cooldown.
tactical.mechanics: Lift speed increased to 375 (from 300). Hover time at top extended to 1.5 s (from 0.5 s). Base cooldown reduced by 5 s and start‑delay reduced to 2 s, making real cooldown ~22 s.
tech: Use Gravity Lift defensively more often thanks to shorter cooldown
Mantle Boost interactions on exit for explosive vertical/horizontal re‑peeks
Pair with Newt Scoot upgrade to glide after exiting for longer horizontal rotations

passive.name: Spacewalk
passive.description: Improved air‑control and reduced landing impact after drops or Gravity Lift usage, allowing faster re‑centering in fights.

ultimate.name: Black Hole
ultimate.description: Deploy Newt to create a micro‑black‑hole that pulls enemies and projectiles towards its centre.

unique_movement_passives: Mantle Boost synergy for explosive vertical/horizontal re‑peeks
Skirmisher perk to see and inspect care packages
movement_profile.notes: Buffed Gravity Lift and ultimate uptime push Horizon back toward high‑mobility anchor play, especially strong in vertical POIs on Olympus.

interactions: Shorter Gravity Lift cooldown allows more frequent vertical checks over cover
known_tech: Lift‑flick peeking (brief lift, peek, drop) benefits from increased lift speed
Lift into Mantle Boost on terrain edges to chain unexpected angles

patch_history.summary: Mobility and uptime buffs to make Horizon more attractive without fully restoring pre‑nerf power.

level_2: Gravity Boots – crouch in air to fall quickly
Newt Scoot – jump after exiting Gravity Lift to glide
level_3: Knock Expert – gain tactical charge on knocks

weapons: Bocek Compound Bow or G7 Scout
recommended_loadouts.notes: Use lift to take top control then farm mid‑range beams. Alternator’s S27 buffs fit Horizon’s short‑exposure peeks; Bocek takes advantage of altitude from Gravity Lift.

damage_profile.notes: Base body damage increased from 18 to 19 in S27.

recoil_profile.notes: No specific recoil change in S27; treat as unchanged from S26 pending firing‑range validation.

projectile.notes: No explicit projectile changes in Amped patch notes.

hopups: Double Tap Trigger (Locked Hop‑Up; 375 points to unlock)

modes.name: Double Tap Trigger
modes.notes: Fires one bullet from each barrel simultaneously per trigger pull.

patch_history.summary: Damage buff, mag size rebalance, and Double Tap integration.

damage_profile.notes: Damage unchanged; only scope compatibility updated.

pois.notes: Large POI with educational/industrial theming; Elysium repositioned nearby.
High‑mobility hub with new rotations to Turbine and other POIs.
New POI replacing older Docks structure; more cover and internal fights.
Brand new industrial POI adding density to previously open areas.

special_loot_features: Phase Driver loot cooldown increased to 90 s

kill_points_curve.s27_adjustments: TBD – exact new per‑placement KP values need in‑game verification.

drop_zones.description: Each Ranked match assigns squads to specific POIs before drop; map preview shows assigned Drop Zone; no Hot Zone.

core_tech.name: Mantle Boost
core_tech.definition: A timed input at the end of a mantle that grants a 1‑frame forward acceleration burst.

inputs.generic: Press bound Mantle Boost key/button during final ~0.15 s of a mantle.

core_tech.legend_variations: Applies equally to all legends; synergises strongly with legends that already chain movement tech (Pathfinder, Horizon, Octane, Valkyrie).

core_tech.name: Trident Jump & Glide
core_tech.definition: Tridents can now jump and glide, allowing aerial routes with hover‑like behavior.

inputs.jump: Press Jump while Trident is on ground to perform a small hop.
inputs.glide: Hold Jump while airborne to glide; steer and boost while gliding.

effects: Can use Boost meter while gliding.

tiering_summary.notes: Aggregated from multiple S27 tier lists and pro analysis.

meta_trends: Valkyrie’s rework + Olympus Rising emphasizes aerial control and macro rotations; Valk is often default pick in high‑tier lobbies.
Horizon’s buffs restore her as a premier vertical‑control legend, especially powerful on Olympus.
Rampart is no longer a meme pick; Amped Cover speed boosts enable bunker‑to‑breach patterns.
Sparrow remains strong but is no longer uniquely dominant; recon ecosystem more balanced.

headline_meta: Alternator jumps into S‑tier thanks to +1 body damage, strong mag sizes, Double Tap hop‑up, and synergy with Gold Laser Sight.
Bocek is heavily favored on Olympus Rising due to long sightlines and 2x‑4x AOG access.
Marksman and sniper dominance reduced by projectile size and headshot multiplier nerfs.
LMGs step back after reverse hipfire removal, giving SMGs and pistols more room.
notable_nerfs: Marksman weapons (30‑30, G7, Bocek) via headshot and projectile changes.

olympus_rising_impact: More cover and mid‑map density reduce third‑party angles and oppressive high‑ground holds.
Reworked Hammond/Rift/Turbine flows encourage safer but more complex rotations.
Olympus verticality synergises strongly with Valkyrie, Horizon, Pathfinder, and Rampart walls.
ranked_playstyle: Drop Zones standardise early loot and reduce extreme RNG; early game focuses on efficient POI clearing.
Heat Shields removed from Ranked and Core BR, forcing teams to respect ring timings and commit to rotations.
Reduced Ladder Champion Dive Trail requirement lowers long‑term grind, encouraging experimentation each season.
